d:
Hello, this is my first translation. I'm still studying Japanese and I choose an old untranslated gallery i liked, mostly to practice. Let me know if something is wrong, English is also not my main language so there might be something that feels off in the adaptation.

I did a bit of redraw on page 13, the author put the wrong hands in the textless version. If someone needs it for another translation just ask me and I'll provide the file. I didn't bother to translate the cover since the it's extremely low quality and the text is just the title.
You can find the textless pictures in the original gallery.

Original gallery: https://e-hentai.org/g/235221/ee9def10a4/
n: [Artist CG] [Durahan] Zetsurin Evanjeru | Unrivaledâ€‹ Evangel (Mahou Sensei Negima!) [English] [PinkHair]
